snippet: Officials are trying to confirm the identity of a man who claims to be a senior commander in the Lord’s Resistance Army, which is led by Joseph Kony in central Africa.
abstract: State Dept says man claiming to be Dominic Ongwen, senior commander in African guerrilla group Lord's Resistance Army, surrendered to military task force of United States and African Union; officials are attempting to confirm his identity; group is led by fugitive warlord Joseph Kony.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: Officials are trying to confirm the identity of a man who claims to be a senior commander in the Lord’s Resistance Army, which is led by Joseph Kony in central Africa.

headline.main: Fighter Defects, Citing Ties to the Fugitive African Warlord Joseph Kony
headline.print_headline: Fighter Defects, Citing Ties to Fugitive African Warlord

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
